name: Yahya Shoaib
title: Senior React Native Developer
intro: I build high-performance mobile apps for Android & iOS with a focus on clean architecture, debugging at scale, and shipping production-ready solutions. Expert in performance optimization, reusable components, and turning complex requirements into maintainable code.

projects.title: MyVisits
projects.description: Location-based doctor visit management app. QR-based check-ins, automatic mileage tracking, telehealth support, and visit history export for reporting.
projects.role: React Native Developer — real-time location, QR flows, performance-focused design

projects.title: Major Lift
projects.description: Platform for engineers to discover jobs, submit bids with estimates, and get assigned by admins. Streamlined bidding and assignment workflow.
projects.role: React Native Developer — UI, bidding system, modular components

projects.title: Unihub
projects.description: Marketplace for students to list and sell products, event tickets, and services. Connects buyers and sellers within campus communities.
projects.role: React Native Developer — marketplace UI, payments, order management

projects.title: Unihub Services
projects.description: Seller-focused app for managing listings, tracking sales, and monetizing with in-app purchases and Stripe.
projects.role: React Native Developer — seller dashboard, payments, navigation

projects.title: Beetkom
projects.description: Property listing app for rent/sale with detailed descriptions, facilities, and photos. Filtering and direct admin contact.
projects.role: React Native Developer — listings, filters, reusable components

projects.title: PELP
projects.description: English learning app with daily lectures, tests, MCQs, and microphone-based vocabulary practice.
projects.role: React Native Developer — learning flows, progress tracking, interactive tools

highlights: Leading mobile app development with focus on performance and scalability
Integrating real-time updates, Stripe payments, and offline-first capabilities
Maintaining clean architecture and reusable code components
Developed multiple production-ready apps for Android & iOS
Optimized app performance, reusable components, third-party integrations
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver scalable solutions on tight deadlines
Hands-on debugging and collaboration on real-world app projects
Contributed to UI enhancement and component reuse strategies
